thread.title: Lee Broom Picks the Best of London Design Festival
thread.title_full: Lee Broom Picks the Best of London Design Festival - Vogue

author: Virginia Van Zanten
title: Lee Broom Picks the Best of London Design Festival
text: Designer Lee Broom —one of the coolest and most well-known British design talents, and the man behind some of the most exciting new lighting designs of recent memory—is sharing his favorite finds from this year’s London Design Festival. Here, updated Eames Elephants, the Tower of Babel, ’70s-throwback textiles, and more:
